synopsis.text: Sound the alarm for the unexpected! A puzzling, yellow orb descends upon a modern-day city, transcending both time and space. This enigmatic sphere intertwines the lives of numerous individuals, giving rise to a series of captivating dramas. As the directorial debut of Xinxin Liu from the 2015 Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation, this anime is accompanied by the harmonious melodies of Shota Kowashi and the innovative sound design of Sachi Takahashi. Produced by Koji Yamamura, this anime promises an intriguing journey through the interconnected lives of those touched by this strange, yellow visitor.
